tidbits.title: Tropical Paradise
tidbits.description: Mauritius is a tropical paradise famed for its stunning beaches, turquoise waters, and diverse marine life, perfect for water sports.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The island celebrates cultural diversity, blending influences from Indian, African, Chinese, and European heritage in its cuisine and traditions.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: Apart from beaches, Mauritius offers lush forests, waterfalls, and the iconic mountain of Le Morne Brabant, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
